fpmExplorer:Page.title: Custom Page
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: You can build your SAP Fiori elements app from a blank custom page while still getting full support through our building blocks, including the Page building block.

Text.text: You can use the building blocks in your custom page as described in the following topic:

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Using the Page Building Block
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: You can use the Page building block to create a new custom page. By default, it contains a title and is preconfigured with the appropriate margins and padding.
